Author: 3-months-to-45
Text: Tbh for me it just took time. After my first attempt at "recovery" last year, I felt so sick keeping any quantity of food down. While I'm still not fully there, it has slowly faded away to a point where it's really only binges that feel awful, and I can stomach a small to regular sized meal. Good luck with it, I know it seems tough, but you can do it!
